data.text: (א) I will praise thee, O Lord, with my whole heart;
I will be glad and rejoice in thee:
(ב) When mine enemies are turned back,
For thou hast maintained my right and my cause;
(ג) Thou hast rebuked the heathen, thou hast destroyed the wicked,
(ה) O thou enemy, destructions are come to a perpetual end:
(ו) But the Lord shall endure for ever:
And he shall judge the world in righteousness,
The Lord also will be a refuge for the oppressed,
And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee:
(ז) Sing praises to the Lord, which dwelleth in Zion:
When he maketh inquisition for blood, he remembereth them:
(ח) Have mercy upon me, O Lord;
That I may shew forth all thy praise
(ט) The heathen are sunk down in the pit that they made:
The Lord is known by the judgment which he executeth:
(י) The wicked shall be turned into hell,
(כ) For the needy shall not alway be forgotten:
Arise, O Lord; let not man prevail:
Put them in fear, O Lord:
